about.title: Why me
about.information: Why are you passionate about coding? You can include some key traits like: analytical thinking, creativity, persistence and collaboration. A problem-solving mindset is always nice to have.

skills.title: My Skills
skills.currentlyLearningText: Show that you are motivated to continually improve your skills, implement innovative solutions and stay abreast of new technologies.

references.title: Need a teamplayer? Here what my colleagues say about me
references.reference1: ‘’Working with Catalina is always a pleasure. She is a reliable and dedicated team member who works efficiently and with great structure. Her helpfulness and attention to overall organization are impressive. Additionally, communication and collaboration with her are always smooth and enjoyable.’’
references.reference2: ‘’I worked with Catalina on our largest team project. With remarkable ease, she took on the task of structuring the core framework and implemented it with natural leadership skills and great empathy. Nevertheless, she remained one of the fastest and most efficient team members, with a strong focus on clean code and optimized solutions, especially for Firebase-related tasks. I truly enjoyed working with her and would gladly do so again at any time.’’
references.reference3: ‘’Catalina had to develop, format and deliver content in collaboration with the team members. She is a reliable and friendly person.’’

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.description: Encourage people to contact you and describe what role you are interested in. Show that you will add value to their projects through your work. Example: Feel free to get in touch with job offers or opportunities such as:
contact.privacyPolicy2: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.

imprint.title: Legal Notice
imprint.name: Catalina Acosta Rivera
imprint.euDisputeResolutionDescription: In accordance with the Regulation on Online Dispute Resolution in Consumer Matters (ODR Regulation), we would like to inform you about the Online Dispute Resolution platform (OS platform). Consumers have the option to submit complaints to the Online Dispute Resolution platform of the European Commission at
imprint.euDisputeResolutionNote: The necessary contact details can be found above in our legal notice. However, we would like to point out that we are not willing or obliged to participate in dispute resolution proceedings before a consumer arbitration board.
imprint.imageCreditsDescription: The images, photos, and graphics on this website are protected by copyright.
imprint.imageCreditsOwner: The image rights are held by: Developer Academy
imprint.textCopyright: All texts are protected by copyright.
imprint.source: Source: Created with the Legal Notice Generator from AdSimple

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.description: Your privacy is important to us. It is our policy to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect from you across our website, [Your Website], and other sites we own and operate.
privacyPolicy.section1Description: We only collect information about you if we have a reason to do so – for example, to provide our services, to communicate with you, or to make our services better. We collect information in three ways: if and when you provide information to us, automatically through operating our services, and from outside sources.
privacyPolicy.section2Description: We use the information we collect in various ways, including to:

section2List.item1: Provide, operate, and maintain our website
section2List.item2: Improve, personalize, and expand our website
section2List.item3: Understand and analyze how you use our website
section2List.item4: Develop new products, services, features, and functionality
section2List.item5: Communicate with you, either directly or through one of our partners, including for customer service, to provide you with updates and other information relating to the website, and for marketing and promotional purposes

privacyPolicy.section3Description: We do not share your personal information publicly or with third parties except when required to by law.
privacyPolicy.section4Description: We will retain your personal information only for as long as is necessary for the purposes set out in this Privacy Policy. We will retain and use your information to the extent necessary to comply with our legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our policies.
privacyPolicy.section5Description: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights regarding your personal data:

section5List.item1: The right to access – You have the right to request copies of your personal data.
section5List.item2: The right to rectification – You have the right to request that we correct any information you believe is inaccurate or complete information you believe is incomplete.
section5List.item3: The right to erasure – You have the right to request that we erase your personal data, under certain conditions.
section5List.item4: The right to restrict processing – You have the right to request that we restrict the processing of your personal data, under certain conditions.
section5List.item5: The right to object to processing – You have the right to object to our processing of your personal data, under certain conditions.
section5List.item6: The right to data portability – You have the right to request that we transfer the data that we have collected to another organization, or directly to you, under certain conditions.

privacyPolicy.section6Description: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page.
privacyPolicy.section7Description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:
